void ControlImpl (NT3Dcontroller cntrl, NTint value)
 ControlImpl overwrites the NT3D_object_o controllers, and are not to be overwritten themselves by derived classes, derived classes implement/overwrite ControlObj.

 ControlObj is to overwritten by derived classes to handle controller calls.

virtual void ControlObj (NT3Dcontroller cntrl, NT_vector_o value)

Detailed Description

The "main axis" of an object in space, should be constructed along the X-Axis, as methods will assume this.

Member Function Documentation

NTuint NT3D_hierarchic_object_o::AddChild ( NT3D_hierarchic_object_o *  pNewChild  ) 

DrawObj() is method should be overridden by derived classes to implement to pure unrotated untranslated object.

Warning:
Note, it has to be declard virtual here, such that upon invocation via Draw() the child method is exectuded and not the parent method !

void NT3D_hierarchic_object_o::Draw (  )  [virtual]

It handles the drawing of the object, its correct positioning and the drawing of the child objects. However, it should not be overridden!

Implements NT3D_object_o.
